item.title: Confusing 20 mph School Speed Signage, 1st September
item.description:
There is now new 20mph signage on Hatherly Road before/after Lakeside School and local area. There is also timed flashing signage mandating 20mph for the area when the lights are flashing. Seems very few drivers honour these signs and reduce speed. However, the implication is that if the flashing signage isn't active the speed limit isn't 20mph so reverts to the default 30mph which is similarly treated with disrespect.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 277, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
